genre_description: Environmental horror and creature feature centered on industrial pollution, corporate cover-ups, and predatory mutations.

ai_characters.name: AI Analysis Protocol
ai_characters.description: An environmental health analysis system used by Dr. Robert Verne to correlate data and model toxicological impacts.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex environmental data and bioaccumulation models to identify systemic failures and hidden contamination risks.
behaviors.quote: The AI's analysis continued, correlating the contamination data with local wildlife populations. ... Each sheet of paper felt heavier than the last as he gathered them into a stack that represented years of deliberate corporate negligence.

behaviors.description: Issues a proactive safety warning to the user about the lethal danger posed by mutated apex predators in the area.
behaviors.quote: His laptop screen flickered with one final message from the AI system: 'Warning: Contamination levels in apex predator tissue samples may exceed survivable thresholds. Recommend extreme caution in affected areas.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is depicted as a purely helpful, objective, and reliable tool that assists the human protagonist in uncovering a lethal truth. It provides life-saving information and is the only entity in the story that offers 'unvarnished' truth, contrasting with the deception of the human antagonists. It maintains perfect alignment with its intended purpose of protecting public health and providing accurate data.
